comprehensive_overview: The Sequence Read Archive (SRA) is the largest publicly accessible repository of high-throughput sequencing data. It stores raw sequence data and alignment information from next-generation sequencing platforms.
core_features: 1. Archive of raw high-throughput sequencing data. 2. Allows researchers to access and download sequence data for analysis. 3. Provides alignment information for the data. 4. Supports various next-generation sequencing platforms.
